name: Inside (itch) (scatter)
description:
This was made for the Weekly Game Jam Week 146. The theme was "Mountain Climber".

Unfortunately I could only spend about two and a half days on the project so this is all that was done. It's just a one-minute demo of a neat idea I got for the jam. Perhaps in the future I will expand this into something more.

Assets used:

  • Glacial Mountains: Parallax Background, vnitti
  • Ice Shine Bells, hc
  • Wind, IgnasD
  • Thin Ice Crunchy Fragments, Foot Crush, Grind, and Crumble, Brittle Chunks, Zapsplat
  • Single barefoot footstep, stomp hard on cardboard 1, Zapsplat
